name: Autumn Is His Favorite Season (prototype)
description:
Thomas Cotard has always been the genius kid. Contests, spelling bees, class discussions - no matter what, he would always naturally come out on top without even trying. It didn't matter that he was lonely... as long as he was the smartest.

Everything changes when he begins high school and finally finds someone who truly understands him - the lonely well-rounded math genius, Patrick Albert Edward Douglas, who quickly starts putting Thomas's earlier successes to shame. With his entire sense of self-worth shattered, Thomas is faced with of envy, The King of Death Destodes himself and his flesh rotting away...

This is an early version of the game and the later portions of the story aren't included yet!

  • Art by Akua Kourin
